name: the Path (itch) (andyone)
description:
2 days project for the 2019 Spring ue4 game jam.
The other side of the coin
He who fights with monsters should be careful lest he thereby becomes a monster
All resources are original and created by me

First time building something in ue4. Not even sure what to include and of course it is not optimized.. not even close ..sorry for that :)
